title: Deep troll

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A stooped troll with dark skin, the cave-dwelling deep troll often travels in packs.***“Buckshank bold and Elfinstone, And more than I can mention here, They caused to be built so stout a ship, And unto Iceland they would steer. They launched the ship upon the main, Which bellowed like a wrathful bear; Down to the bottom the vessel sank, A laidly Trold has dragged it there.” -George Borrow, \_Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest\_. 1851. |

## Useful Info

**Deep trolls** are an advanced type of [troll](/List_of_trolls "List of trolls") that usually roam in packs. While weaker than [iron trolls](/Iron_troll "Iron troll"), they can deal significant damage as a pack, and they'll usually come with magical support. They are commonly found in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") (accompanied by [ironbound preservers](/Ironbound_preserver "Ironbound preserver")) and [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths") (accompanied by [deep troll earth mages](/Deep_troll_earth_mage "Deep troll earth mage") and [deep troll shamans](/Deep_troll_shaman "Deep troll shaman")).

## Tips & Tricks

- Their numbers are their only unique trait. Fight them in corridors, or at least avoid being surrounded. If there's a deep troll earth mage present, however, don't expect rock [walls](/Wall "Wall") to be much use in funneling opponents. Area-of-effect attacks are nice to have.
- Deep troll shamans can [Haste Other](/Haste_Other "Haste Other") and [Might Other](/Might_Other "Might Other"). Even a single deep troll can be dangerous, if it's hasted and mighted.

### Variant Deep Troll

[![Deep troll monk ghost.png](/images/5/5a/Deep_troll_monk_ghost.png)](/File:Deep_troll_monk_ghost.png) The ghosts of **deep troll monks** will occasionally coalesce as you explore [Wucad Mu's Monastery](/Wucad_Mu%27s_Monastery "Wucad Mu's Monastery").
html:
Deep troll

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all trolls, see list of trolls.

deep troll T 
HP 36-74
HD 10
XP 729
Speed 10
AC 6
EV 10
Will 40
Attack1 27 (bite: plain)
Attack2 20 (claw: plain)
Attack3 20 (claw: plain)
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type troll, deep troll
Flags See invisible
Regenerates
Unblindable
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A stooped troll with dark skin, the cave-dwelling deep troll often travels in packs.

“Buckshank bold and Elfinstone,
And more than I can mention here,
They caused to be built so stout a ship,
And unto Iceland they would steer.

They launched the ship upon the main,
Which bellowed like a wrathful bear;
Down to the bottom the vessel sank,
A laidly Trold has dragged it there.”
-George Borrow, _Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest_. 1851.

Useful Info

Deep trolls are an advanced type of troll that usually roam in packs. While weaker than iron trolls, they can deal significant damage as a pack, and they'll usually come with magical support. They are commonly found in the Vaults (accompanied by ironbound preservers) and the Depths (accompanied by deep troll earth mages and deep troll shamans).

Tips & Tricks

  • Their numbers are their only unique trait. Fight them in corridors, or at least avoid being surrounded. If there's a deep troll earth mage present, however, don't expect rock walls to be much use in funneling opponents. Area-of-effect attacks are nice to have.
  • Deep troll shamans can Haste Other and Might Other. Even a single deep troll can be dangerous, if it's hasted and mighted.

Variant Deep Troll

The ghosts of deep troll monks will occasionally coalesce as you explore Wucad Mu's Monastery.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Deep_troll&oldid=73766"

==Useful Info==
'''Deep trolls''' are an advanced type of [[list of trolls|troll]] that usually roam in packs. While weaker than [[iron troll]]s, they can deal significant damage as a pack, and they'll usually come with magical support. They are commonly found in [[the Vaults]] (accompanied by [[ironbound preserver]]s) and [[the Depths]] (accompanied by [[deep troll earth mage]]s and [[deep troll shaman]]s).

==Tips & Tricks==
*Their numbers are their only unique trait. Fight them in corridors, or at least avoid being surrounded.  If there's a deep troll earth mage present, however, don't expect rock [[wall]]s to be much use in funneling opponents. Area-of-effect attacks are nice to have.
*Deep troll shamans can [[Haste Other]] and [[Might Other]]. Even a single deep troll can be dangerous, if it's hasted and mighted.

===Variant Deep Troll===
[[File:Deep troll monk ghost.png]] The ghosts of '''deep troll monks''' will occasionally coalesce as you explore [[Wucad Mu's Monastery]].
